verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa kahena--brahmā, tomāra nā bujhi vacana
jīva-hṛdi, jale vaise sei nārāyaṇa

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kahena—says; brahmā—O Brahmā; tomāra—your; nā—not; bujhi—I understand; vacana—speech; jīva—of the living entity; hṛdi—in the heart; jale—in the water; vaise—sits; sei—that; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa.
translation: Kṛṣṇa said, "Brahmā, I cannot understand what you are saying. Lord Nārāyaṇa is He who sits in the hearts of all living beings and lies down in the waters of the Kāraṇa Ocean."
